revised_title: The Effect of Light on Diastase in Foliage Leaves
tldr: The author conducted experiments to study the effect of light on diastase, an enzyme found in plants, and its role in photosynthesis. They discovered that light exposure reduces the amount of diastase in plants, suggesting that it may play a role in protecting the plant from damage caused by light. This research provides insight into the complex relationship between light and plant growth.
